post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Toronto, Ontario
Other Pay: 45 - 60 k
Employee Type: Full-Time Employee
Manages Others: Not Specified
Job Type: Information Technology
Experience: 3 to 5 years
Post Date: 21/01/2010 Contact Information
Ref ID: bertojo-757688
Description
IT Programmer needed for a busy manufacturing plant. Experience in a manufacturing company an absolute must. Must have a degree in Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science or related field. 3-5 years experience in engineering systems, database application management and network understanding also needed. Key knowledge is on Java programming, MS SQL Server 2000 / 2005 in depth and ASP needed.

http://www.careerbuilder.ca/ca/jobseeker/jobs/jobdetails.aspx?job_did=J3F7X7621699F5KLRB9&cbRecursionCnt=1&cbsid=83f60ab226ad4a60a17aaba098415d27-319411293-RE-4
post.title: MS SQL SERVER JOB
